metadata.synopsis: Wyll warns you he might leave the party because your relationship status is getting low.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe debugbookadd companion > add wyll > I understandctrl+shft character. This will give you their ID name on bottom left of screenin recon: changeApprovalRating S_Player_Wyll [Character ID] -20eg: changeApprovalRating S_Player_Wyll HALFELVES_Female_Wood_Player -20

1.speaker: Wyll
1.text: The first time I saw you, I figured you a champion. A person of valour, integrity.

2.speaker: Wyll
2.text: We've made a connection. Please, don't sacrifice that for the sake of cold-blooded thrills.

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: But you seem intent on proving me wrong.
